descriptions:
["DescriptionPresenting this upgraded 2 bedroom apartment for sale in Murjan 1 Jumeirah Beach Residence. This property comes with sea and marina views and is located on a high floor and now available for sale.
Living room is spacious and brightwith a balcony overlooking in to Marina, kitchenhas a semi open space and a service door attached.
Master bedroom and the additional bedroom have build in wardrobes and wooden flooring. The apartment is rented for AED 83,000 per annum until December 2020 and viewings are possible with prior notice.
Jumeirah Beach Residence has changed the face of Dubai's coastline. Overlooking the Arabian Gulf, and located along one of the largest beachfront in Dubai, the properties are spacious, prestigious, and indulgent with everything you need right on your doorstep.
Designed for families looking for the pleasures of a beach resort lifestyle throughout the year This destination offers residential and hotel accommodation, as well as retail space and entertainment facilities to create a luxury lifestyle for all who reside or visit.
The design of JBR reflects an architectural theme, a fusion of Mediterranean and local architectural elements while retaining its own unique style and aesthetic expression.
JBR occupies the heart of Dubai Marina separated from the mainland by the sea. This prime location is just minutes from illustrious neighbors such as Dubai Internet City, Dubai Media City, Emirates Golf Club, and a string of luxury hotels, all along the beach. For those seeking a bustling metropolis, Downtown Dubai is located just 15 - 20 minutes away. A perfect combination between the serenity of a beach resort lifestyle and a cosmopolitan city life, it is clear why JBR is considered the address of Dubai.
Come visit us at our Dubai Marina Retail Shop in the Promenade Marina Gate 1"]

descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to welcome to the market this exclusive one-of-a-kind custom built 6 bedroom villa with beachfront views and opulent contemporary architecture in one of the most coveted locations in Dubai, Palm Jumeirah.
This luxurious villa is built over 15,661 sq.ft area and boasts a picturesque architecture design with the utmost quality of finishes. The bright open living area brings in the sunlight through massive floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the backyard which features a private infinity pool, and amazing beach/frond views. The outdoor area includes a patio next to the pool to makes those dusky sunset evenings even more memorable. 
The villa boasts ultra-modern form with designer finishings including marble floor, high-end stone tops, and the huge open kitchen with white good equipped. All the bedrooms are surrounded by beautiful views of the ocean. The villa also provides a large outdoor terrace on the first floor for hosting friends & family gatherings.
This deluxe villa is ideal for families to enjoy a beachfront living experience at the heart of Palm Jumeirah.
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]
